markdownRemark.html:
Hi all! Thank you for reading this lines.

My name is Mason. In Viet Nam my name is Cường. I'm the front end developer with 3 years experience (calculating from the current time when i write this post)

I'm coding ReactJS and NodeJS, almost the time is ReactJS. The goals in the future is fullstack js developer

I admit i'm not a excellent or good the developer. However, i still want to share my experience, my problem and how to resolve them to everyone.

I hope will be received the contribution from you.

Glad to see you!
